content: Ringer Pictures Presents ‘Moreyball’ A shot-for-shot remake of ‘Moneyball,’ chronicling the Rockets’ turnaround The Houston Rockets have been one of the stories of the season. General manager Daryl Morey’s 3-and-Free style of play has become a winning reality. The Rockets have won 55 games, leading the NBA in 3-pointers and free throw attempts. James Harden is the focal point of the second-best offense in the league. But it wasn’t always this problem-free in Houston. This time last year, the Rockets were finishing an agonizing .500 season, their two stars were feuding, and they were looking for a new head coach, having fired their coach just 11 games into the campaign. It is a remarkable turnaround, and Moreyball is the story of that turnaround. It’s a (more or less) shot-for-shot remake of Moneyball. We couldn’t get Brad Pitt, but otherwise it’s basically the same thing.
title: Ringer Pictures Presents ‘Moreyball’
